content.rendered:
Directed by Divya Khosla Kumar.

Written by Sanjeev Dutta. Hussain Dalal. Adhir Bhat. Abbas Dalal.

Cast Rishi Kapoor(Dadu). Pulkit Samrat(Akash). Yami Gautam(Shruti). Urvashi Rautela(Akanksha). Neel Tyagi(Kid Akash). Delissa Mehra(Kid Shruti). Navya(Kid Akanksha). Devansh Sharma(Kid Akash Friend). Anita Khosla(Rani Saheba). Prachee Shah(Akash’s Mother (as Prachee Shah Pandya)). Dayal(Akash’s Chacha). Shashwita Sharma(Akash’s Maid). S.K. Batra(Shruti’s Father). Nakul Kadam(Milkman / Chaiwala). Manoj Joshi(Mr. Handu) . Ankit Arora(Shruti’s Cousin / Doctor). Edwin Autridge(Black Man). Ketki Dave(Visitor’s Wife). Olalla Herrero MontaÃ±Ã©s(Foreign dancer). Aashish Kaul(Akash’s Father). Abhishek Khanna(Peon). Musa Muhammed Olayinka(Akash Doctor). Shreyas Porus Pardiwalla(Titu (Bond) (as Shreyas Pardiwalla)). Bharti Singh(Yoga Teacher). Divya Khosla Kumar(Dancer in ‘Humne Pe Rakhi Hai’ song (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Hanif Chunawala. Ajay Kapoor. Bantoo Khanna. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Rajesh Shah. Salim Shaikh.

Production T-Series.
